Kluster, not Kruster.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> OOC: See that Kruster is shooting RazorClaws too.
> 
> BIC:
> 
> Khonkolor::
> 
> Khonkolor shoot again 25 times against Razor Claws. 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., x_rauq_x@y... wrote:
> > OOC: rAuq here, posting from Jer's house.
> > 
> > ::Dead-End/Astroblast/Switchblade/Rampage/Divebomb/Razorclaw::
> > 
> > Dead-End comes out of the CR and shakes his head, "Oooo, I hate 
> go'n 
> > in there." He starts running behind Speedbreaker and Wildrider,
and 
> > transforms into car mode, roaring off with them.
> > ------------------
> > 
> > Astroblast has enough time to say "Uhhh oh," as a wave of sharpnel 
> and 
> > plasma pelt him shaking his spaceship form violently. "Megatron, I 
> > can't take many more hits like that," He surveils the exterior 
> damage, 
> > there were nasty gashes along his sides, and his armour was 
> charred. 
> > "Megatron, my scanners are still operational and are picking up 
> > several blips moving quickly towards us. If you open fire on them 
> now, 
> > they can easily be terminated; they look to be missiles, but they 
> seem 
> > to be heading towards the Ark." His hatch open's slightly. "We'll 
> have 
> > to return to the base... take care of our trailers quickly.
> > 
> > Switchblade is thrown across the storage room as the shrapnel and 
> > plasma bombard the ship. "Uhh." He growns as he gets to his feet, 
> > "Astroblast, watch where you're going next time," he stomps back
to 
> > his place, grumbling about bad drivers and stuff.
> > ------------------
> > 
> > OOC: Airly, Razorclaw pounced at Khonkolor again. (also, Razorclaw 
> is 
> > in Lion mode right now, that's why he's pouncing) =)
> > 
> > Razorclaw misses his pounce, and dodges left, a trail of machine 
> gun 
> > fire following him. He snarls, then fakes right and rushes 
> Khonkolor, 
> > hind legs pumping, and his claws outstreched. 
> > ------------------
> > 
> > Tantrum's body lands beside Rampage, "Oh no, I'm gonna have to
save 
> > your hide as well?" Rampage grabs Tantrum, and leaps into flight,
a 
> > grenade from Epyon exploding underneath him, and he almost drops 
> the 
> > wreckage he's carrying.
> > ------------------
> > 
> > Divebomb has returned to the CF battle, and is in flight a ways 
> above 
> > the base. "BOMBS AWAY, haha haaaa," he launches two large bombs at 
> the 
> > CF.
